channel.title: Hyperion easy question!
channel.description:
My run.bat for the Hyperion server won't turn on. It tells me java is not recognized as a command.
This is the code Im using.
[code]@echo off java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar;lib/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;lib/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar org.hyperion.Server pause[/code]
Thanks Scipyo

item.title: Hyperion easy question!
item.dc:creator: @scipyo scipyo
item.description:
